thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com | 296 2
thread.title: Tom Lindstrom
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Tom Lindstrom

author: Tom Lindstrom
title: Tom Lindstrom
text:
I ordered 3 different items on the 10:th of March. They arrived on the 27:th, 28:th and 29:th. That is to me fast shipping when it´s free of charge. During the time of awaiting my order I contacted their customer service with a few questions. They do aswer very fast and are very helpful. I do recommend Banggood for just anyone.
.../Tom L from Sweden
